about_the_game:
Welcome! This is an open-world game. In this game, you will have the freedom to explore every corner of the game, visit various attractions, and experience the vibrant game walk.
As an open-world game, it features a vast map. You can stroll through the game, admire the beautiful scenery, and immerse yourself in the cultural atmosphere of the game.
In short, in this game, you will be able to enjoy true freedom. Come join us and explore this beautiful game together!

The key operation: WASD controls the player to move, space to jump, and the mouse control the perspective.

Update plan: better graph, add stories.
detailed_description:
Welcome! This is an open-world game. In this game, you will have the freedom to explore every corner of the game, visit various attractions, and experience the vibrant game walk.
As an open-world game, it features a vast map. You can stroll through the game, admire the beautiful scenery, and immerse yourself in the cultural atmosphere of the game.
In short, in this game, you will be able to enjoy true freedom. Come join us and explore this beautiful game together!

The key operation: WASD controls the player to move, space to jump, and the mouse control the perspective.

Update plan: better graph, add stories.
name: District XiLin - 西林区

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10-64bit
  • Processor: core-i3 3220
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx1050ti
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10-64bit
  • Processor: core-i5 9400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rtx3060
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

short_description: This is a first-person open-world game similar to a walking simulator.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Danish*, Ukrainian*, Russian*, Bulgarian*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Turkish*, Greek*, Norwegian*, Czech*, Japanese*, Polish*, Thai*, Swedish*, Traditional Chinese*, Romanian*, Finnish*, Dutch*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Spanish - Latin America*, Vietnamese*, Arabic*, Korean*, Uzbek*, Urdu*, Armenian*, Igbo*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Croatian*, Icelandic*, Cherokee*, Galician*, Catalan*, Afrikaans*, Kannada*, Luxembourgish*, Hindi*, Gujarati*, Kyrgyz*, Kazakh*, Turkmen*, K'iche'*, Kinyarwanda*, Tajik*, Serbian*, Odia*, Welsh*, Konkani*, Bangla*, Nepali*, Basque*, Hebrew*, Latvian*, Tigrinya*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Swahili*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Georgian*, Maori*, Wolof*, Bosnian*, Persian*, Telugu*, Tamil*, Irish*, Estonian*, Valencian*, Belarusian*, Quechua*, Zulu*, Xhosa*, Lithuanian*, Sotho*, Sorani*, Yoruba*, Uyghur*, Scots*, Tswana*, Filipino*, Mongolian*, Hausa*, Dari*, Azerbaijani*, Amharic*, Albanian*, Assamese*, Tatar*, Macedonian*, Marathi*, Malayalam*, Malay*, Maltese*, Khmer*
*languages with full audio support
